title: Mediterranean noodle
description: Spaghetti noodle with seafood and spice, specialty of the kitchen. Atention: It contains shrimp and others seafoods!

title: House noodle
description: Noodle with seafood and spice, specialty of the kitchen. Atention: It contains shrimp and others seafoods!

title: Noodle with chilli
description: Fetuccine noodle with chilli sauce and spices.

title: House salad with grilled salmon
description: House salad (lettuce, arugula, carrot) with salmon.

title: Beef with potatos
description: Ox beef (150g) on the plate, with fried potato. It comes with rice and sauces.

title: Minced rump steak with vegetables and dough
description: 400g of minced rump steak, with grilled vegetables and dough chosen by the costumer.

title: Vegan lasagna (soy meat)
description: Lasagna 100% vegan made with soy meat and special dough.

title: Special Salad
description: Saladd with avocado, mango, lettuce, chickpea and many more.

title: Meat-ball
description: Meat-ball portion with sour cream, onion and spices. Accompanies rice or dough.
